oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Another version of the story of the Crow Messengers appears, here, in connexion with the adventure related above ; /kwammana and his companion being, in this instance, those who were found by the successful bird (Corvus scapulatus). (L VIII.-2. 6147-6157).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crows and a note on secretary birds
